sentences.en: An overwhelming majority of the members were against the idea.
sentences.cn: 占压倒性多数的成员反对这项主张。

sentences.en: an overwhelming sense of guilt
sentences.cn: 一阵不能自制的内疚感

sentences.en: He has exhibited symptoms of anxiety and overwhelming worry.
sentences.cn: 他表现出焦躁不安和过度忧虑的症状。

sentences.en: She felt an overwhelming desire to hit him.
sentences.cn: 她恨不得揍他一顿。

sentences.en: She found the city quite overwhelming when she first arrived.
sentences.cn: 她初来时觉得这座城市令她不知所措。

sentences.en: The act was adopted by an overwhelming majority.
sentences.cn: 该法案以压倒多数通过.

sentences.en: The British Air Force succeeded despite overwhelming odds against them.
sentences.cn: 英国空军虽然处境极为不利，但还是完成了任务。

sentences.en: the contrast between his overwhelming guitar-playing and his underwhelming singing
sentences.cn: 他那激昂的吉他演奏与其味同嚼蜡的歌唱之间的反差

sentences.en: The evidence against him was overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 对他不利的证据确凿，无法抵赖。

sentences.en: The flood was overwhelming and the city was soon drowned.
sentences.cn: 洪水来势凶猛,很快这个城市就被淹没了.

sentences.en: The legacy of Ancient Rome represented the overwhelming influence on Romanesque architecture.
sentences.cn: 古罗马的遗产体现在对罗马式建筑的巨大影响上.

sentences.en: The Ministry has been defeated by an overwhelming majority.
sentences.cn: 内阁被压倒多数票击败.

sentences.en: The motion was passed by an overwhelming majority.
sentences.cn: 提案以压倒多数通过.

sentences.en: The overwhelming feeling is just deep, profound shock and anger.
sentences.cn: 最强烈的感觉就是深深的震惊和愤怒。

sentences.en: The overwhelming majority of those present were in favour of the plan.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数与会者都赞同这个计划。

sentences.en: The parliament has voted by an overwhelming majority to suspend its declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 议会以压倒性的多数票决定推迟宣布独立。

sentences.en: The people voted overwhelmingly for change.
sentences.cn: 人们以绝对多数投票赞成变革。

sentences.en: The proposal has been given overwhelming support.
sentences.cn: 这一提议得到了压倒性多数的支持。

sentences.en: The sense of space and emptiness is overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 巨大的空虚感汹涌袭来。

sentences.en: The silence was fathomless and overwhelming.
sentences.cn: 这种寂静深不可测，令人不知所措。

sentences.en: The smell outside this building is overwhelming — like rotten eggs.
sentences.cn: 这栋大楼外面的气味让人无法忍受——就像臭鸡蛋的味道。

sentences.en: There is overwhelming evidence that smoking damages your health.
sentences.cn: 有难以辩驳的证据表明吸烟有损健康。

sentences.en: They realized it would be suicidal to resist in the face of overwhelming military superiority.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到面对力量相差如此悬殊的军队，抵抗无异于自取灭亡。

sentences.en: Writing is a good tool for discharging overwhelming feelings.
sentences.cn: 写作是宣泄强烈感情的好方法。

sentences.en: You may find it somewhat overwhelming at first.
sentences.cn: 起初你可能觉得它有些无法抗拒。

trans.tran_cn: 势不可挡的，压倒一切的，巨大的，压倒一切的欢乐
trans.tran_en: very large or greater, more important etc than any other
